name: UITextDroppable
desc: The interface that determines if a text view is a drop destination.

items.name: var isTextDropActive: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the text view has at least one active drop session.

items.name: var textDropInteraction: UIDropInteraction?
items.desc: The drop interaction object added by UIKit to the text view.

items.name: var textDropDelegate: UITextDropDelegate?
items.desc: The text drop delegate for interacting with a drop activity in the text view.
